siteMetadata.title: Blog by Amirhossein Movahedi
siteMetadata.subtitle: I belong to no religion, my religion is LOVE and every heart is my Temple (Rumi)

frontmatter.title: Telar Social Media Architecture using Domain Driven Design for Microservices
frontmatter.description: In this Article you will learn about Telar Social Architecture and how it helps to boost your productivity, development Speed, flexibility, scalability and so on. We are not going deep in DDD and Microservices but how we used them in Telar Social in a nutshell.

frontmatter.title: Easy steps from OpenFaaS to your own Telar Social Media on Cloud
frontmatter.description: By the end of this article you have your own [Telar Social](https://telar.press) media up and running using OpenFaaS on OpenFaaS Cloud through some easy steps in a nutshell.

frontmatter.title: Mail from Slack by OpenFaaS Cloud
frontmatter.description: In this tutorial I want to show you how I built a function to send emails from a Slack command. It runs for free on OpenFaaS Cloud using the Community Cluster.

frontmatter.title: OpenFaaS multi-stage with Istio on Kubernetes
frontmatter.description: In this post I want to show you how to Install OpenFaaS in multi-stage with Istio on Kubernetes and supporting cert-manager for SSL.
